title: Team Assignment #3: Digitalis Study
text:
Code
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(dplyr))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(kableExtra))
suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(targets))

tar_load(df)
tar_load(lista_zmiennych)



Dokumentacja do pobrania

 Digitalis Investigation Group Data Documentation  Publikacja NEJM 1997



Lista zmiennych


Code
lista_zmiennych %>% 
  kable() %>% 
  kable_classic_2()





var_labels
var_names




patient id
id


0=placebo, 1=treatment
trtmt


calculated: age at randomization
age


q5: race, 1=white 2=nonwhite
race


q4: sex, 1=male 2=female
sex


q3: ejection fraction (percent)
ejf_per


q3a: ejection fraction method
ejfmeth


q6: chest x-ray (ct-ratio)
chestx


calculated: body mass index (kg/m*m)
bmi


q9a: serum potassium level
klevel


q9: serum creatinine (mg/dl)
creat


q10: recommended digoxin dose
digdoser


q12: duration of chf (months)
chfdur


q13: rales
rales


q14: elevated jugular venous pressure
elevjvp


q15: peripheral edema
pedema


q16: dyspnea at rest
restdys


q17: dyspnea on exertion
exertdys


q18: limitation of activity
actlimit


q19: s3 gallop
s3


q20: pulmonary congestion
pulcong


calculated: sum of q13-q20, y/n status
nsym


q21: heart rate (beats/min)
heartrte


q22: diastolic bp (mmhg)
diabp


q22: sysolic bp (mmhg)
sysbp


q23: nyha functional class
functcls


q24: chf etiology
chfetiol


q25: previous myocardial infarction
prevmi


q26: current angina
angina


q27: history of diabetes
diabetes


q28: history of hypertension
hyperten


q29: digoxin within past week
diguse


q30: potassium sparing diuretics
diuretk


q31: other diuretics
diuret


q31a: potassium supplements
ksupp


q32: ace inhibitors
aceinhib


q33: nitrates
nitrates


q34: hydralazine
hydral


q35: other vasodilators
vasod


q36: dose of digoxin/placebo prescribed
digdose


hosp: cardiovascular disease
cvd


days randomization to first cvd hosp
cvddays


hosp: worsening heart failure
whf


days randomization to first whf hosp
whfdays


hosp: digoxin toxicity
dig


days rand. to first digoxin tox hosp
digdays


hosp: myocardial infarction
mi


days randomization to first mi hosp
midays


hosp: unstable angina
uang


days rand. to first unstable angina hosp
uangdays


hosp: stroke
strk


days randomization to first stroke hosp
strkdays


hosp: supraventricular arrhythmia
sva


days rand. to first supravent arr. hosp
svadays


hosp: ventricular arrhythmia
vena


days rand. to first vent. arr. hosp
venadays


hosp: coronary revascularization
crev


days rand. to first cor. revasc.
crevdays


hosp: other cardiovascular event
ocvd


days rand. to first other cvd hosp
ocvddays


hosp: respiratory infection
rinf


days rand. to first resp. infection hosp
rinfdays


hosp: other noncardiac, nonvascular
oth


days rand. to 1st other non cvd hosp
othdays


hosp: any hospitalization
hosp


days randomization to first any hosp
hospdays


number of hospitalizations
nhosp


vital status of patient 1=death 0=alive
death


days till last followup or death
deathday


cause of death
reason


primary endpt: death or hosp from hf
dwhf


days rand. to death or hosp from whf
dwhfdays

title: Team Assignment #3: Outcome
text:
Liczba os贸b


Code
n_total <- nrow(df_trtmt)
n_total


[1] 3397

title: Team Assignment #3: Outcome
text:
Sumaryczna liczba event贸w


Code
n_events <- sum(df_trtmt$dwhf)
n_events


[1] 1041

title: Team Assignment #3: Outcome
text:
Liczba obserwacji ucitych


Code
n_censored <- n_total - n_events
n_censored


[1] 2356

title: Team Assignment #3: Outcome
text:
Czas obserwacji

Dni


Code
summary(df_trtmt$dwhfdays)


   Min. 1st Qu.  Median    Mean 3rd Qu.    Max. 
    1.0   481.0  1025.0   930.4  1360.0  1781.0 




Lata


Code
summary(df_trtmt$dwhfdays / 365.25)


    Min.  1st Qu.   Median     Mean  3rd Qu.     Max. 
0.002738 1.316906 2.806297 2.547248 3.723477 4.876112

title: Team Assignment #3: Outcome
text:
Skumulowana czsto wystpowania


Code
m0 %>%
  ggsurvfit() +
  add_confidence_interval() +
  add_risktable() +
  labs(
    title = "Cumulative Incidence Curve",
    x = "Time (days)",  # adjust if needed
    y = "Cumulative event probability"
  ) +
  scale_y_reverse(trans = "reverse")  # flip survival to mortality

title: Team Assignment #3: Outcome

title: Team Assignment #3: Outcome
text:
2-letnie prze偶ycia


Code
summary(m0, times = 2*365.25)


Call: survfit(formula = Surv(dwhfdays, dwhf) ~ 1, data = df_trtmt)

 time n.risk n.event survival std.err lower 95% CI upper 95% CI
